name: Randomage (Serpendio, FacelessCheetah, Umarria, AffordableNature, Missingnull, Dwonga)
name_original: Randomage (Serpendio, FacelessCheetah, Umarria, AffordableNature, Missingnull, Dwonga)
description:
How to Play

Your goal is to kill the skeletons and get to the last room!

Controls: 

  • Left mouse button - Attack 
  • Right mouse button - Laser 
  • WASD - movement 
  • Mouse - aim 

The team: 

  • Sebastian Smith - Programmer 
  • Felipe B Marques - Programmer 
  • Edmund Leung - Programmer 
  • Daniel Owens - Composer/Sound Designer
  • Drew Dwonga - 3D artist 
  • Ronja Bjørkmann - Team Lead/Artist
